page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our Domesday block includes two areas with very different characteristics.The first area includes Burnt Oak and Colindale, which has many shopping and service facilities which cater mainly for the Watling and Grahame Park Estates. The area is also well known for its aerodrome and flying displays of the past, which featured such people as Claude-Grahame White. Today,Aerodrome Road has replaced the famous runway and the Grahame Park Estate is built on the airfield. The M1 motorway runs down through the middle of our block,with the second area of Mill Hill and Hendon lying in its eastern half. 35% of the land-cover in these areas is open space,with attractive parks and a well used sports centre. Hendon is the longest established part of our block.
